tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE convergence_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    optimization_id INT,
    iteration_number INT,
    loss_value DECIMAL,
    convergence_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ConvergenceBehavior (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    convergence_rate DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    iterations INT NOT NULL,
    accuracy DOUBLE PRECISION
);

CREATE TABLE QuantumOptimization (
    optimization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT REFERENCES ConvergenceBehavior(experiment_id),
    quantum_unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    optimization_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    convergence_threshold DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE OptimizationHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    optimization_id INT REFERENCES QuantumOptimization(optimization_id),
    iteration_number INT NOT NULL,
    objective_value DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    convergence_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE QuantumOptimizationParameters (
    optimization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_name VARCHAR(50),
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    convergence_threshold FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE QuantumOptimizationData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    optimization_id INT,
    iteration INT,
    loss FLOAT,
    gradient_norm FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE QuantumOptimizationResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    optimization_id INT,
    final_loss FLOAT,
    convergence BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE QuantumOptimizationStatus (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    optimization_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE QuantumOptimizationMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    metric_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    optimization_id INT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_optimization_id FOREIGN KEY (optimization_id) REFERENCES OptimizationAlgorithm(optimization_id)
);

CREATE TABLE OptimizationAlgorithm (
    optimization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    convergence_speed FLOAT NOT NULL,
    optimization_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    max_iterations INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE OptimizationHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    optimization_id INT NOT NULL,
    iteration_number INT NOT NULL,
    optimization_loss FLOAT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_opt_id FOREIGN KEY (optimization_id) REFERENCES OptimizationAlgorithm(optimization_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    optimization_id INT NOT NULL,
    input_data TEXT NOT NULL,
    output_data TEXT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_opt_id FOREIGN KEY (optimization_id) REFERENCES OptimizationAlgorithm(optimization_id)
);
